data.meanings: Hell or Hell-fire, name of the fire with which GOD will punish in the life to come, proper name of the abode of punishment.
data.sentence: The word جَهَنَّمَ comes from the root ج ه ن م and is associated with the meanings: Hell or Hell-fire, name of the fire with which GOD will punish in the life to come, proper name of the abode of punishment.

data.meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.
data.sentence: The word فَوَرَبِّكَ comes from the root ر ب ب and is associated with the meanings: to be a lord and master, collect, possess/owner, rule, increase, complete, bring up, preserve, chief, determiner, provider, sustainer, perfecter, rewarder, creator, maintainer, reposer of properties, developer, former of rules and laws of the growth, foster a thing in such a manner as to make it attain one condition after another until it reaches its goal of completion.

data.meanings: To gather together, raise from the dead, banish.
data.sentence: The word لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ comes from the root ح ش ر and is associated with the meanings: To gather together, raise from the dead, banish.

data.meanings: To be present, present at, stand in presence of, hurt, be at hand.
data.sentence: The word لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ comes from the root ح ض ر and is associated with the meanings: To be present, present at, stand in presence of, hurt, be at hand.

data.meanings: (Ha-Alif-Lam) To be changed, come in between, pass by.
data.sentence: The word حَوْلَ comes from the root ح و ل and is associated with the meanings: (Ha-Alif-Lam) To be changed, come in between, pass by.
